alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Franklin; Gosper; Harlan; Phelps; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 06 at 7:45PM CDT until April 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING. ANOTHER RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT FOR THURSDAY DUE TO CONTINUED STRONG WINDS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 060, 072, 073, 083, 084 AND 085... * AFFECTED AREA...In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 060 Dawson, Fire Weather Zone 072 Gosper, Fire Weather Zone 073 Phelps, Fire Weather Zone 083 Harlan, Fire Weather Zone 084 Franklin and Fire Weather Zone 085 Webster. * WINDS...Northwest 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Dawson; Franklin; Gosper; Harlan; Phelps; Webster
